column8: Invoca de Modo Especial 1 "Espíritu del Faraón" desde tu mano o Deck. Si cualquiera de estas cartas
column11: manda al Cementerio todas ellas que controles
column12: incluyendo esta carta.$The Second Sarcophagus/The Third Sarcophagus/Spirit of the Pharaoh$$Sends from your field to your Graveyard/Sends from field to Graveyard for cost/Sends itself from field to Graveyard for cost/Places cards from hand in Spell & Trap Zone/Places cards from Deck in Spell & Trap Zone$Trigger-like/Continuous-like$
